DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Asia. This is a clinical trial investigating the effectiveness of using Biphasic Insulin Aspart 70/30 in two different treatment regiments for 6 months in subjects with type 2 diabetes, not well controlled on their current oral anti-diabetic drug therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness and Safety of Biphasic Insulin Aspart 70/30 in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes HbA1C = 7.5% Insulin na√Øve Current treatment by Oral Antidiabetic Drugs Severe medical conditions
